text: - [Narrator] Data, it's the foundation

that all machine learning
models are built upon.

Amazon SageMaker Feature
Store makes it easy to store,
share, and manage features for ML models.
What's a feature?

Features are ML model
inputs used during training

and inference derived from
multiple data sources.
High-quality features are critical

when it comes to ensuring
a highly accurate model.
If an app recommends a music playlist,

features might include song
ratings and listening duration.
With SageMaker Feature Store,

you can take in data
from a wealth of sources
as well as catalog, search,

and reuse features
across different ML apps.
It supports offline storage for training

and online storage for
real-time inference,
which means your offline
and online data sets remain in sync.

You can use the exact
set of feature values
from a specific point in time,

such as patient medical
data, prior to a diagnosis.
You can even create feature pipelines
for a range of projects,

eliminating the need for
rework and duplication.
When you need a fully managed service
for machine learning features,

Amazons SageMaker Feature
Store is your solution.
Get started now.
(upbeat music)
